title: Personal Word Bank
description: Add new vocab as you go, and organize them into your own word bank. Your words, your way — no generic lists, just what matters to you.

title: Daily Reminders
description: Set gentle reminders that nudge you to review or practice your saved words. You control the time and frequency — we’ll take care of the memory jog.

title: Practice with Writing Prompts
description: Get writing prompts and short exercises tailored to your saved words, so you can actually use them — not just recognize them.

title: Grammar Correction
description: AI checks your writing, corrects grammar, and suggests better sentences — so you can practice with confidence.
